message.content:
Here is the information extracted and summarized in the requested JSON format:

```json
{
    "ocr_text": "M
November 24, 1909.
Mr. E. Lewis Evans, Secretary,
Tobacco Workers' International Union,
Room 56, American National Bank Bldg., Louisville, Ky
Dear Sir and Brother:
I am in receipt of a letter from the Secretary of the Central Body of Louisville, Ky., in which he advises me that the Local Union of your organization in that city is not represented in the Trades and Labor Assembly. I am sure that you can readily realize the disadvantage which results from such a course being followed by a Local Union attached to its International, and I would therefore appreciate it very much if you would kindly communicate with your Local in the city named and urge upon it the necessity and advisability of taking prompt steps to become affiliated with the Central Body, as provided by the Constitution of the American Federation of Labor, Section 2, Article XI.

Trusting that this will receive your prompt attention, and thanking you in advance, I am,
Fraternally yours,
Samuel Gompers
President
American Federation of Labor.",
    "summary": "The letter dated November 24, 1909, addresses Mr. E. Lewis Evans, Secretary of the Tobacco Workers' International Union, regarding the lack of representation of their local union in Louisville, Ky., in the Trades and Labor Assembly. The letter urges communication with the local union to affiliate with the Central Body as per the American Federation of Labor's constitution.",
    "date": "1909-11-24",
    "is_printed": true,
    "is_legible": true
}
```
